name: Agropur Inc
bio: Chef de file de l’industrie laitière nord-américaine.

industries.name: Dairy Products, Except Dried Or Canned

twitter.bio: Chef de file de l’industrie laitière nord-américaine.

crunchbasecompany.bio: Agropur cooperative is a Canadian dairy industry leader.

linkedincompany.bio: Fondée en 1938, Agropur coopérative est un chef de file de l'industrie laitière nord-américaine ayant un chiffre d’affaires de plus de 4,7 milliards de dollars. La Coopérative est une source de fierté pour les 3 473 producteurs de lait qui en sont membres et les 8 000 employés qui y œuvrent. Agropur transforme plus de 5,4 milliards de litres de lait par année dans ses 40 usines réparties en Amérique du Nord et propose une impressionnante gamme de marques et de produits dont Natrel, Québon, OKA, Farmers, Agropur Signature, Central Dairies, Agropur Grand Cheddar, Sealtest, Island Farms et finalement, iögo et Olympic d’Aliments Ultima, une coentreprise d’Agropur coopérative. Founded in 1938, Agropur is an important player in the North American dairy industry. With sales of more than $4.7 billion, the Cooperative is a source of pride for its 3,473 dairy producer owners and 8,000 employees. Agropur processes more than 5.4 billion litres of milk per year in its 40 plants across North America and boasts an impressive line of products that includes such prestigious brands and products such as Natrel, Québon, OKA, Farmers, Agropur Signature, Central Dairies, Agropur Grand Cheddar, Sealtest, Island Farms, and the Ultima Foods joint venture’s iögo and Olympic brands.

name: Bothwell Cheese Inc.
location: 61 Main St.  New Bothwell Manitoba, R0A 1C0 Canada
bio: A leading Canadian Artisanal cheesemaker, making quality, natural cheese with no modified milk ingredients since 1936.

twitter.bio: A leading Canadian Artisanal cheesemaker, making quality, natural cheese with no modified milk ingredients since 1936.

linkedincompany.bio: Tucked away in the heart of Manitoba's dairy belt in New Bothwell, Bothwell Cheese has been producing quality cheese since 1936. Today you can still taste the difference in cheese made with fresh, locally-produced milk. We use 100% pure Canadian milk and there are absolutely no modified milk ingredients used in the production of our cheeses. Our cheeses also do not contain any preservatives, fillers, gluten or animal rennet and all of our smoked cheeses are naturally smoked using real hickory and maple wood in our in-house smokehouse. About Our People Bothwell Cheese keeps time-honoured traditions alive by drawing on the wealth of talent and experience of its dedicated people. We respect and nurture our style of cheesemaking that has been passed down through the generations since 1936. With our team devoted to this tradition we are able to continue to produce the highest quality artisanal cheeses. Our Vision Tomorrow’s wholesome dairy products for today’s world. Our vision is to pave a path producing wholesome and high quality dairy products for generations to come. Our Mission We believe in producing products with wholesome ingredients—the way Mother Nature intended. We make food we feel good about feeding Canadians and our families. We simply wouldn't have it any other way. We craft products that impact local economies by supporting family farms and the environment in a positive way. It is our promise that we always deliver the highest quality products, made only with the freshest available local milk. Sticking true to our promise, we will not sacrifice quality, regardless of cost. Get to know us better! https://www.facebook.com/BothwellCheese/ https://twitter.com/bothwellcheese http://pinterest.com/bothwellcheese/ http://instagram.com/bothwellcheese www.realcheesenaturally.com

name: Chapman’s Ice Cream
location: 100 Chapman's Crescent  Markdale Ontario, N0C1H0 Canada
bio: Founded in 1973, we are the largest independent ice cream manufacturer in Canada, producing hundreds of products including gluten free, & peanut free offerings.

twitter.bio: Founded in 1973, we are the largest independent ice cream manufacturer in Canada, producing hundreds of products including gluten free, & peanut free offerings.

linkedincompany.bio: To make ice cream products “For the Kid in All of Us” – this was the main vision of Penny and David Chapman, when they started their business in 1973. Since that time Chapman’s Ice Cream has gone on to become the largest independent ice cream manufacturer in Canada. With over 500,000-square-foot of state-of-the-art facilities, 289 product types and 50 Low temperature transport trucks, Chapman’s is committed to deliver creamy ice cream goodness to every Canadian family. Chapman’s Ice Cream delivers the highest-quality ice cream with 100% Canadian milk and dairy product. We are also known for the largest range of ice cream products for people with special dietary needs from peanut free to no-sugar-added to low fat to sorbet, etc. Our philosophy is to always make the consumer a priority – we are a consumer-driven Canadian company.

bio: Food importer, manufacturer and distributor of nuts, dried fruits, rice crackers, other snack foods and spices etc. from around the world. The company’s products are distributed under its own trademarks of Dan-D-Bulk, Dan-D-Pak and Dan-D-Organic with the slogan “Fine Foods of the Earth”. name: Earth's own Food Company Inc.
location: 5350 Canotek Rd Suite 7  Gloucester On, K1J 9C9 Canada
bio: Changing the world through plant-based living🌱We love making tasty and wholesome food & beverages that are better for you and the earth #earthsown

twitter.bio: Changing the world through plant-based living🌱We love making tasty and wholesome food & beverages that are better for you and the earth #earthsown

linkedincompany.bio: Earth's Own Food Company is a pioneering healthy food & beverage company dedicated to nutritional innovation and sustainability in order to actively improve people's lives and well being. With a product line-up that includes leading non-dairy beverage brands So Good, So Nice, Almond Fresh and Ryza, Earth's Own Food Company is devoted to developing great tasting wholesome products that are good for our consumers, their families, the community and the planet. Earth's Own Food Company is dedicated to well being in everything we do from our nutrition education initiatives and community involvement programs right through to our commitment to making great tasting nutritious products.

name: Gay Lea Foods Co-operative Ltd.
location: 5200, Orbitor Drive  Mississauga On, L4W 5B4 Canada
bio: Gay Lea Foods is a co-operative with members on more than 1,400 dairy farms in Ontario and Manitoba. We believe we can achieve more by working together.

industries.name: Dairy Products, Except Dried Or Canned

twitter.bio: Gay Lea Foods is a co-operative with members on more than 1,400 dairy farms in Ontario and Manitoba. We believe we can achieve more by working together.

linkedincompany.bio: Gay Lea Foods is a co-operative owned by over 1,200 farmers. That's approximately one quarter of Ontario's dairy farmers, with six production facilities. We manufacture a range of wholesome dairy products including milk, dips, butter, sour cream, whipped cream, and cottage cheese. More than just the pursuit of quality dairy products, Gay Lea Foods is about people. To date, we've raised $300,000 in support of co-operative development around the globe. We continuously upgrade our facilities and equipment to ensure our employees work in safe, healthy environments. And we reinvest, renovate and innovate so that our customers are guaranteed delivery of fresh and delicious dairy products. It's this genuine interest in our people, our customers, and food innovation that has brought us over 50 years of success.

name: The Jim Pattison Group
bio: The Jim Pattison Group is headquartered in Vancouver, BC, Canada and is comprised of over 505 locations worldwide focusing on the automotive, agriculture, media, packaging, food and beverage, magazine distribution, entertainment, export, and financial industries. With sales of over $8.1 Billion in 2013 and more than 36,000 employees, The Jim Pattison Group is the second largest private company in Canada. The mandate of the Jim Pattison Group is total customer satisfaction and that goal continues to enable the individual divisions of the Jim Pattison Group to become leaders in their markets.

crunchbasecompany.bio: The Jim Pattison Group is Canada’s 2nd largest privately held company and, in a recent survey by the Financial Post.
